name: Sbulers
description:
Sbulers is a game I made in 2011 using Game Maker 8, the first "complete game" I ever made. It is not really a good game, by the way, but I wanted to publish it for sake of history :D

It is a puzzle game in which you have to control three characters with different colors, but each character can only step blocks that are of their respective color.

It features 9 levels and is only available in portuguese (sorry, I didn't knew english so well back in 2011 xD).
